to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.model

Class CarFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.model.CarFeatures

  • public class CarFeatures
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain the information, what features supported by the car. The instances of this class are immutable.
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean adjustableSpeed
      Is the speed adjustable.
      boolean batteryPower
      Car provides information about remaining battery power of the car.
      float cameraPanMax
      The maximum pan of the camera to the right.
      float cameraPanMin
      The maximum pan of the camera to the left.
      float cameraTiltMax
      The maximum tilt of the camera up.
      float cameraTiltMin
      The maximum tilt of the camera down.
      boolean driveBackward
      Car can drive backward.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CarFeatures(float cameraPanMin, float cameraPanMax, float cameraTiltMin, float cameraTiltMax, boolean adjustableSpeed, boolean driveBackward, boolean batteryPower)
      Creates a new CarFeatures

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean supportPanCamera()
      Car supports panning of the camera (horizontal rotate).
      boolean supportTiltCamera()
      Car supports tilting of the camera (vertical rotate).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cameraPanMax

        public final float cameraPanMax
        The maximum pan of the camera to the right. Possible values are 0-180 degree. 0 degree is looking forward. (If it don't support right pan, the value is 0.)

      • cameraPanMin

        public final float cameraPanMin
        The maximum pan of the camera to the left. Possible values are 0-180 degree. 0 degree is looking forward. (If it don't support left pan, the value is 0.)

      • cameraTiltMax

        public final float cameraTiltMax
        The maximum tilt of the camera up. Possible values are 0-180 degree. (0 degree is looking forward.) (If it don't support up tilt, the value is 0.)

      • cameraTiltMin

        public final float cameraTiltMin
        The maximum tilt of the camera down. Possible values are 0-180 degree. 0 degree is looking forward. (If it don't support down tilt, the value is 0.)

      • adjustableSpeed

        public final boolean adjustableSpeed
        Is the speed adjustable. If not the car can only drive with constant speed.

      • batteryPower

        public final boolean batteryPower
        Car provides information about remaining battery power of the car.

      • driveBackward

        public final boolean driveBackward
        Car can drive backward.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • supportPanCamera

        public boolean supportPanCamera()
        Car supports panning of the camera (horizontal rotate).
        Returns:
        True, if supported.
        See Also:
        cameraTiltMin, cameraTiltMax

      • supportTiltCamera

        public boolean supportTiltCamera()
        Car supports tilting of the camera (vertical rotate).
        Returns:
        True, if supported.
        See Also:
        cameraPanMin, cameraPanMax
